slide1.desc: Manage all your ride-hailing and delivery apps in one place. Maximize your earnings by accepting or declining requests based on custom filters, with automatic online/offline switching.

slide2.desc: Save time and reduce distractions with our auto-accept and auto-decline features. Set filters for trip type, fare, and distance to drive smarter, not harder.

slide3.desc: Keep track of your earnings in real-time. Get detailed insights into your hourly rates, earnings per mile, and more, to help you work more efficiently.

signin.title: Sign In
signin.subtitle: For personalized experience, login to your account.
